channel.title: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.
channel.description:
[url]https://twitter.com/#!/BlackMesaDevs/status/186176753209835520[/url]
Apparently they have an official Facebook page now. [url]https://www.facebook.com/BlackMesaDevs[/url]
Could this be the long awaited start at building up hype, since they said they had abandoned the social networking things?
Or is it just an April Fools joke?

item.title: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.
item.dc:creator: Ibanez
item.description:
Or…

item.title: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.
item.dc:creator: Hanzales
item.description:
For me (poor english skills) it sounded like developers encountered some problems during testing procedures last days. Then I noticed “Heard ingame” and remembered it’s a phrase from start of the game.

item.title: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.
item.dc:creator: Hanzales
item.description:
[COLOR=‘RoyalBlue’]Heard in game: “Those TPS reports have gotten progressively worse these days”

I just got scared a lot. Focused on “TPS reports” and it’s meaning, then noticed “Heard in game:” uh oh Good one! You got me ;o)

Read full topic
item.source: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.

item.title: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.

item.description:
I’m pretty sure Ram isn’t a plastic surgeon and cannot help you “develop.” =P

item.source: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.

item.title: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.
item.dc:creator: BarneyCalhoun
item.description:
Raminator:

Oh shit, he’s right. The mod could’ve been out years ago if it weren’t for the constant Twittering.

Sorry guys, I let you down.

Damnit, Ram! Develop me!

Read full topic
item.source: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.

item.title: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
Deathmonkey7:

You know it!

<3

Though to be fair, my post wasn’t related to the twitter feed, but the update posted to facebook.
I was unaware at the time that the twitter feed was also updated.

Yeah, the “app” that Twitter said tweeted the tweet was Facebook, so I’m not surprised.

Read full topic

item.source: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.

item.title: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
All I noticed was James Kane’s personal site has been updated to include screens of his work on “Insurgency 2.”

At any rate, it’ll probably release alongside Starcraft: Ghost.

Read full topic
item.source: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.

item.title: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.
item.dc:creator: Deathmonkey7
item.description:
BahamutBBob:

So what happened earlier today, when the Twitter feed said the website had been updated? The tweet that has been deleted. Someone slipped up and posted it a few days early? Soundtrack release imminent???

I doubt it. It’d be awesome if it was that close, though.

Edit: I should have known some fag would have made a new thread instead of posting in the perfectly good thread we have.

You know it!
Though to be fair, my post wasn’t related to the twitter feed, but the update posted to facebook.
I was unaware at the time that the twitter feed was also updated.

Read full topic
item.source: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.

item.source: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.

item.title: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.
item.dc:creator: JamesKane
item.description:
Bah:

No, the thing is: The way I see it, these days there’s a mod being developed, right? And, ages in the future, there won’t be a mod being developed, right? So, there must be a moment, in the future, when there being a mod being developed goes away, right? And there being no mod being developed comes along. So, what I want to know is: When will we get from the one case of affairs to the other case of affairs?

About two weeks after the release of the soundtrack.

Read full topic
item.source: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.

item.description:
It made me smile. Thank you.

item.title: The devs just updated the Twitter feed.
item.dc:creator: Bah
item.description:
Dr. Karamazov:

I think what Baldrick is trying to ask is “When will BMS be finished?”.

I’m glad someone got the reference.

Read full topic
